data.text: @PrasherKunal Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through a travel agency, you have to contact the agency for refund. We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons. Thank you for your understanding.

data.text: @MissventC Greetings, ticket prices vary depending on the flight’s date and the day of purchase.
@scott2105 Our colleagues will proceed with refund as soon as possible. We do apologize for the inconvenience.

@scott2105 In this case, the travel agency will coordinate with us directly. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to your agency as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@itspprn_ กรณีดังกล่าว หากท่านได้ส่งเรื่องขอคืนเงินแล้ว ท่านจะได้รับเงิน/เครดิตเงินคืนหลงจากได้รับการยินยัน ตามกระบวนการ 180 วันค่ะ
@itspprn_ สวัสดีค่ะ เจ้าหน้าที่จะเร่งดำเนินการตรวจสอบตามลำดับ และติดต่อกลับหาท่านโดยเร็ว ขออภัยในความล่าช้ามา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ
@MaddyScott93 Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@mjnhthuvu We suggest that you delete your personal information and booking information for security reasons. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

data.text: @khay_hai Hello. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@sumity14 The booking that is made by the travel agency, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly and contact back to you. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@sumity14 if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@sumity14 Greetings, could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@izzybangbang We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com

@izzybangbang We are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@Narendr31696692 Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. If there are any updates on this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@ioop16 We will contact you via DM.
@ioop16 Greetings, we suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via DM instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@loops Greetings, if there are any updates on this issue, our officers will contact you as soon as possible.
@ssweqss สวัสดีค่ะ เนื่องจากมีผู้ติดต่อเข้ามาเป็นจำนวนมาก จึงอาจทำให้การดำเนินการล่าช้า อย่างไรก็ตามเจ้าหน้าที่จะเร่งดำเนินการให้ตามลำดับ ต้องขออภัยในความล่าช้ามา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ
@padi642188 As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue. We do apologize for the inconvenience.
@padi642188 Our staff will reply to you as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for your unpleasant experience with our services.

@padi642188 We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience

@AroraAr56872367 @DGCAIndia @goibibo @MoCA_GoI Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.

@AroraAr56872367 Passengers who booked their tickets through travel agencies are advised to contact their agents for assistance. The travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@loops Greetings, we would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@JTRathmer Greetings, we already contact you via direct message.
@padi642188 If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. (2/2)

@trianaw4re We are sorry for the inconvenience this caused.

@trianaw4re We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information. However, we suggest that you contact our THAI office in the city of your departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR in order to give you further assistance.
@trianaw4re We kindly suggest you contact our staff via email attaching all related information. They will check the terms and conditions of your ticket and reply to you.

@trianaw4re We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@trianaw4re Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

data.text: @biblio__babs They will reply back to you as soon as possible.
@biblio__babs If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. (2/2)
@biblio__babs Greetings, we are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. (1/2)
@renkamra @goibibo We do apologize for the inconvenience. We suggest that you contact the travel agency for further information.

@renkamra If the booking is made by the travel agency and you would like to cancel, you have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case.

@renkamra We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@ahuja_gurmeet We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

@009BAK Greetings, The travel vouchers will be able to use as normal and please contact your local THAI Office to make a new reservation for issue a ticket against the travel voucher before it expires.

@HerDearPhil Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Please be assured that they will proceed with refund as soon as they can. Thank you.

@JohnRyanStyle Hello. Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@MehtaYachna Please wait for our staff to reply back. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@arjun_kushwaha Thank you.
@arjun_kushwaha We already sent a message to you.
@arjun_kushwaha  We invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise.

@StFual We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or contact for more information at the Department of Disease Control Tel: 1422.
@mike8345 May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@DonDannyDang Since there are currently many contacts delaying the response from staff However, the staff will expedite the investigation and contact you shortly. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

@DonDannyDang We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@pramodkan Hi, we already sent a private message to you.

@helen_hlr If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. However, If you booked directly with https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q We suggest you send an email to net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com or our office at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR to refund.
